name: The Dream Den
description:
Welcome to The Dream Den, the finest fantasy bar this side of the border. Step in from the rain, take a seat, and drink yourself into a dream you won't soon forget. Whether you want to be a sword swinging knight, a western gunslinger, or a star traveling space cadet, The Dream Den's got plenty of adventure and mystery for you to discover. 

Just remember to drink responsibly.

~~~

Another old writing project and my second major Twine game, it expands upon the storytelling and mechanical foundation of SCAVENGER for a much more out there experience with a whole lot of routes and a whole lot of endings. Enjoy! 

Original cover art image from Stock Search and Mae Mu.
